Fur

Using only fur clippings, you can have a memorial of your pet to touch and cherish.

Fur preservation is one of the most versatile methods of preserving and remembering your pet. Families choose to remember their pets through shaped fur; paw, tail, or complete pelt preservation; whisker and fur clippings; and felted balls.

Our Mission

Precious Creature exists in order to provide compassionate and judgement-free pet taxidermy, aftercare, memorial, and master preservation services for individuals and families.
